tasks.title: Setup Development Environment and Project Structure
tasks.description: Create the basic project structure and install required dependencies for the TechSaaS platform.
tasks.details: Create the directory structure as specified in the PRD section 4.1.1. Initialize a git repository. Create and activate a virtual environment. Install core dependencies including Flask, requests, beautifulsoup4, langchain, and other required packages. Set up the Node.js dependencies with npm init and install express, axios, cors, and dotenv.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all directories are created correctly. Confirm all dependencies install without errors. Test that the virtual environment activates properly.

tasks.title: Integrate Hitomi-Downloader
tasks.description: Set up and integrate Hitomi-Downloader as the primary video scraping engine for the platform.
tasks.details: Clone the Hitomi-Downloader repository. Identify core Python modules for scraping functionality. Create a wrapper that can call these modules programmatically. Configure for programmatic access according to section 4.1.4 of the PRD. Ensure proper setup for later API integration.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify Hitomi-Downloader installation is complete. Test basic functionality of the downloader. Confirm the wrapper can access core Hitomi functions.

tasks.title: Create Video Scraper Flask API
tasks.description: Develop a Flask API wrapper to expose Hitomi-Downloader functionality via REST endpoints.
tasks.details: Implement Flask app in video-scraper/api/app.py as outlined in the PRD. Create endpoints for listing supported sites, extracting video info, and downloading videos. Implement proper error handling and response formatting. Configure the service to run on port 5500 as specified in the architecture.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each API endpoint individually. Verify correct responses for valid inputs. Test error handling with invalid inputs. Confirm the API can extract information from test URLs.

tasks.title: Develop Video Scraper Web Interface
tasks.description: Create a responsive web UI for controlling the video scraping functionality.
tasks.details: Implement the HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the video scraper interface as outlined in the PRD. Create the tabbed interface with URL input, search, and downloads sections. Implement form handling and API integration. Add functionality for extracting video information, selecting formats, and initiating downloads.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the UI in multiple browsers. Verify all tabs and forms function correctly. Test the extraction and download workflows with real URLs. Ensure error messages display properly.

tasks.title: Set Up LangChain and Ollama
tasks.description: Configure the AI service with LangChain framework and Ollama integration.
tasks.details: Implement the setup.py script as specified in the PRD. Create functions to check Python version, install dependencies, set up Ollama based on platform, pull required models (llama3.2:3b, grok:3b), and create necessary directories. Ensure proper error handling and user feedback throughout the setup process.
tasks.testStrategy: Run the setup script and verify all components install correctly. Confirm Ollama is running and the specified models are available. Test basic model inference to ensure the setup is functional.

subtasks.title: Validate Python environment
subtasks.description: Check the Python version and ensure it meets the minimum requirements.
subtasks.details:
- Check that Python version is 3.7 or higher
- Provide clear error message if Python version is unsupported
- Exit setup process if Python version check fails
- Test by running setup script with different Python versions

subtasks.title: Install dependencies
subtasks.description: Install the required Python packages and dependencies.
subtasks.details:
- Read dependencies from requirements.txt file
- Install each dependency using pip
- Handle potential installation errors and provide feedback
- Verify installations by importing key packages
- Test dependency installation by running setup script on clean environment

subtasks.title: Platform-specific Ollama setup
subtasks.description: Set up Ollama based on the detected operating system.
subtasks.details:
- Detect the operating system (Windows, macOS, Linux)
- Follow platform-specific setup steps for Ollama
- Download and install Ollama binaries/packages
- Set necessary environment variables
- Test Ollama setup by running simple Ollama command

subtasks.title: Download required models
subtasks.description: Pull the required models for LangChain and Ollama integration.
subtasks.details:
- Create directories for storing models (llama3.2:3b, grok:3b)
- Download model files from specified sources
- Verify checksums of downloaded model files
- Handle download errors and provide retry mechanism
- Test model downloads by checking file presence and sizes

subtasks.title: Test LangChain and Ollama integration
subtasks.description: Verify the setup by running a test script that uses LangChain with Ollama.
subtasks.details:
- Create a test script that imports LangChain and Ollama
- Initialize Ollama models and run a simple query
- Verify the output and check for any errors
- Provide clear success/failure messages based on test results
- Include the test script in the setup process
- Test the integration with different models and queries

tasks.title: Implement LangChain Base Components
tasks.description: Create the core LangChain components for AI functionality.
tasks.details: Implement the LangChainService class as specified in the PRD. Create methods for initializing the service with Ollama models, creating chains with templates, generating responses, switching models, and managing conversation memory. Set up the prompt templates for different tasks including video analysis, web scraping, social media analysis, crypto analysis, and general chat.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each method of the LangChainService class. Verify chains can be created with different templates. Test response generation with sample inputs. Confirm model switching and memory management work correctly.

subtasks.title: Create LangChain Service Class
subtasks.description: Implement the core LangChainService class for model management and template handling.
subtasks.details:
- Implement LangChainService in service.py
- Add initialization with model configuration
- Create methods for model switching and management
- Implement template loading functionality
- Add error handling for missing dependencies
- Make the service configurable with environment variables

subtasks.title: Create Prompt Templates
subtasks.description: Develop prompt templates for different analysis types.
subtasks.details:
- Create video_analysis.txt template for video content analysis
- Create web_scraping.txt template for web content analysis
- Create social_media.txt template for social media analysis
- Create crypto_analysis.txt template for cryptocurrency market analysis
- Create general_chat.txt template for conversational interactions
- Ensure templates follow a consistent format with placeholders

subtasks.title: Implement Chain Creation and Response Generation
subtasks.description: Add functionality to create chains with templates and generate responses.
subtasks.details:
- Implement the create_chain method for different analysis types
- Add response generation with proper context management
- Implement streaming capability for long responses
- Add functionality to customize chain settings
- Ensure proper error handling for chain execution

subtasks.title: Implement Memory Management
subtasks.description: Add conversation memory capability to the LangChain service.
subtasks.details:
- Implement memory management for persistent conversations
- Add methods to clear, save, and load memory states
- Create functionality to summarize long conversations
- Ensure memory is properly used in chain creation
- Make memory configurable based on use case

subtasks.title: Create LangChain Service Tests
subtasks.description: Develop comprehensive tests for the LangChain service.
subtasks.details:
- Create test_langchain_service.py with unit tests
- Implement mocking for LangChain components
- Test initialization, model switching, and template loading
- Add tests for chain creation and response generation
- Test memory management functionality
- Ensure high test coverage for all critical functionality

tasks.title: Develop Web Tools for LangChain
tasks.description: Create web-related tools for the LangChain framework to enable search and content extraction.
tasks.details: Implement the WebTools class as specified in the PRD. Create methods for search functionality (with and without API key) and webpage content extraction. Implement proper error handling and content processing. Ensure tools can be integrated with LangChain agents.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search functionality with sample queries. Verify webpage content extraction with various websites. Test error handling with invalid inputs and unreachable sites. Confirm tools can be properly integrated with LangChain.

tasks.title: Create Flask API for AI Service
tasks.description: Develop a Flask API to expose LangChain functionality through REST endpoints.
tasks.details: Implement the Flask app for the AI service. Create endpoints for different AI tasks including chat, analysis, and tool usage. Initialize LangChain components and chains for different templates. Implement proper request handling, validation, and response formatting. Configure the service according to the architecture specifications.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each API endpoint with valid and invalid inputs. Verify correct responses and error handling. Test integration with the LangChain service. Confirm the API can handle different types of requests and templates.

tasks.title: Implement Web Browser Interface
tasks.description: Create an integrated web browser within the platform with search functionality.
tasks.details: Create a Flask-based browser interface as specified in the PRD. Implement URL navigation, history, and content rendering. Create a search interface with multiple engine options. Implement results parsing and display. Add functionality to detect scrapable content in the browser and enable one-click scraping.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the browser interface with various websites. Verify navigation, history, and rendering work correctly. Test search functionality with different queries and engines. Confirm the scraping integration works with compatible content.

tasks.title: Implement Security Layer and API Gateway
tasks.description: Create the security layer and API gateway to integrate all components of the TechSaaS platform.
tasks.details: Implement authentication, encryption, and anonymization features as outlined in the architecture. Create an API gateway to route requests to the appropriate services. Configure the gateway to run on port 5000 as specified. Implement proper request validation, error handling, and logging. Ensure all components can communicate securely through the gateway.
tasks.testStrategy: Test authentication with valid and invalid credentials. Verify encryption for sensitive data. Test request routing to different services. Confirm error handling and logging work correctly. Perform integration testing of the entire platform through the gateway.

tasks.title: Implement Multimodal Processing Integration
tasks.description: Develop multimodal processing capabilities with Ollama and HuggingFace models, enhancing the video scraper with video and image analysis features.
tasks.details: Create a unified model manager for Ollama and HuggingFace models. Implement multimodal processor with video frame extraction and analysis capabilities. Enhance the Hitomi-LangChain connector with multimodal support. Update the web interface to display analysis results. Add comprehensive integration testing and documentation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test model management across different hardware environments. Verify frame extraction with various video formats. Test analysis results for accuracy. Confirm UI displays results correctly. Perform integration testing with the entire pipeline.
